/* 컨텐츠 정보 */ SELECT c.CONTENTS_NAME AS contentsName, CONCAT(c.CONTENTS_SELL_START_DATE, '~', c.CONTENTS_END_DATE) AS contentsSellDuration, if(c.CONTENTS_PG=0, '전체 관람가', CONCAT(c.CONTENTS_PG, '세 이상 관람가')) AS contentsPg, CONCAT(FORMAT(c.CONTENTS_PRICE, 0), '원') AS contentsPrice, cf.FILE_NAME AS fileName, si.STORE_NAME AS storeName, c.AMOUNT_CONTENT_REMAINING AS amountContentsRemaining FROM CONTENTS AS c INNER JOIN CONTENTS_FILE AS cf ON cf.CONTENTS_ID=c.CONTENTS_ID INNER JOIN STORE_INFO AS si ON si.STORE_ID=c.STORE_ID ORDER BY c.CONTENTS_REG_DATE DESC
LIMIT #{startContentsNum}, #{contentsPerPage};
